content: project level intermediate description crochet up these sweet cupcake hats for all ages there are so many options for these hats baby photo props halloween costumes or just for fun this pattern is worked continuously from the top down with a small cherry added to the top specifics size 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months toddler child teen adult gauge 2 = 4 double_crochet row and 7 double_crochet sts see approximate circumference/length for each size hook size 5 5mm i 4 0mm g other tools tapestry needle stitch markers scissors yarn weight medium 4 worsted yarn used wecrochet / knit picks brava worsted red heart super saver other materials poly-fil stuffing size guide 0-3 months 13 head circumference 3-6 months 14 head circumference 6-12 months 16 head circumference toddler 18 head circumference child 20 head circumference teen 21 head circumference adult 23 head circumference - pattern is written in standard us crochet terms - the pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern - please note all sales are final on digital items no refunds will be made view my blog to see more of my patterns www thenicolechase com pattern copyright © 2020 nicole chase all rights reserved pattern may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own pattern you may sell the finished product on a small scale pattern/design credit given to www thenicolechase com is appreciated permission to sell does not include mass production large scale production is prohibited photography copyright © 2020 nicole chase all rights reserved photos may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own
